text: Murayghil (), alternatively spelled Mreighel or Mirgele, is a village in northern Aleppo Governorate, northwestern Syria. Located halfway between Azaz and al-Rai, some north of the city of Aleppo and south of the border with the Turkish province of Kilis, the village administratively belongs to Nahiya Sawran in Azaz District. Nearby localities include Rael to the southeast and al-Judaydah (Yani Yaban) to the south. In the 2004 census, Murayghil had a population of 157. ==References==
title: Murayghil
